author: Sara Fischer
title: Jeff Zucker’s replacement at CNN will be Chris Licht
description: The network is still embroiled in a messy legal battle.
content:
Longtime CBS executive Chris Licht has been chosen to lead CNN Worldwide, succeeding Jeff Zucker, a source close to CNN tells Axios. 
Why it matters: Licht takes the reins at a chaotic time for CNN.… [+863 chars]
